item.title: Spotify Wrapped is Everything Wrong With the Modern Music Industry
item.description: The depersonalization of music, the quantification of art, and capitalism ruining everything.

item.title: A Syncing Ship - The iPod vs. Modern Software
item.description: A long, twisting tale of trying to get an MP3 player from 2005 to work on a new computer. Plus, some side tangents about metadata, various artists, and consistency.

item.title: How To Build A Local Music Library
item.description: You should build a local collection of your favorite music - here's how.

item.title: The Lost Time System's Guide to Fixing Windows 11
item.description: Our personal go-to routine for setting up Windows 11 on any new machine.

item.title: No Boilerplate Has A Laptop Problem
item.description: A response to No Boilerplate's "Developers Have A Laptop Problem".

item.title: Apple Music vs. Spotify: Welcome to the Social
item.description: An evaluation and comparison of Apple Music and Spotify as competing products, from the lens of social features.

item.title: Graduation: Thank You, Kilobytes
item.description: Saying good-bye to KODA, one final time.

item.title: Streaming Service Showdown
item.description: Throwing a bunch of streaming services into the ring to find out who takes the crown (and our money).

item.title: VRChat: Easy Anti-Consumer
item.description: Tackling VRChat's addition of Easy Anti-Cheat to its client.
